code: import api from"../api/api";import{API_URL}from"../constant/api";/* Function for getting list data */export var get_all_products=function get_all_products(){return api.get("".concat(API_URL.GET_ALL_PRODUCTS)).then(function(resp){return resp.data;},function(err){return err;});};/*  Function for to fetch the product based on category  */export var get_productByCategory=function get_productByCategory(data){return api.get("".concat(API_URL.GET_PRODUCT_BY_CATEGORY,"/").concat(data),data).then(function(resp){return resp.data;},function(err){return err;});};/*  Function for to fetch single product details  */export var get_singleProductDetail=function get_singleProductDetail(data){return api.get("".concat(API_URL.GET_SINGLE_PRODUCT,"/").concat(data),data).then(function(resp){return resp.data;},function(err){return err;});};/*  Function for to fetch single product details  */export var get_sortProductPrice=function get_sortProductPrice(data){return api.get("".concat(API_URL.GET_PRODUCT_SORTING,"?sort=").concat(data),data).then(function(resp){return resp.data;},function(err){return err;});};
